alert.note: Alert for North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 02 at 5:29PM MST until February 02 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...SNOW DIMINISHING THIS EVENING... .Snow will continue to gradually diminish this evening. There will be minor accumulations this evening in areas south of Interstate 70, with flurries ending in areas further north. Roads remain slick in some areas, especially on less traveled areas. Temperatures will be very cold with lows tonight dropping below zero in most areas. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light snow, ending this evening. Additional snow accumulations of an inch or less. * WHERE...Limon, and Southern Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Areas of slick roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling on icy roads.

area.areaDesc: North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
